QueryResult.text: SELECT C.ID, C.CURRENCY_CODE, C.ISO_NUMBER, C.CURRENCY_SYMBOL, C.IS_EU_CURRENCY, C.EUR_CONV_RATE, C.CURRENCY_PRECISION, C.DISPLAY_PRECISION, C.IS_ACTIVE, C.CREATED_DATE, C.CREATED_BY, C.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, C.LAST_UPDATED_BY, NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE, NLS.NAME, NLS.DESCRIPTION FROM CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS NLS, CMN_CURRENCIES C WHERE NLS.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_CURRENCIES' AND NLS.PK_ID = C.ID
